name: Toybox Aviation
description:
Skyhackz - Toybox Aviation is a physics based modular vehicle sandbox.

Construct airplanes from modular pieces and see how far they can fly.

The game is in early access and your feedback is very welcome 🛩️

Follow us @skyhackz

Features

  • Modular Vehicle Construction.
  • Physics Based Flight. 
  • Many plane components each with flight effects.

  • New flight physics.
  • Added flight camera.
  • Fixed UI scaling.
  • Fixed load bug on start.
  • Fixed phantom forces causing planes to curve unexpectedly.

  • Various UI changes.
